item.title: My history of mech keebs
item.description: DISCLAIMER! These are my own opinions and your mileage may vary. I am just a geek who decided to document “projects” by making blog posts about them. Bad gaming peripherals I have a “thing” for “things” that are used for writing. I love pencils and keyboards, but don’t know why. My history with PC peripherals was filled with gaming branded accessories for a good while, when I got into computers (and computer science).

item.title: Hello!
item.description: I am Heikki Stark and this is my random blog. The purpose of this blog is to help me document my free time projects. Otherwise the greater purpose is unkown to me. Little about the author My name is Heikki and I live in Finland. I am currently work as a information security specialist at Nixu Corporation, but during my free time I am part of a hacking team called LeftOvers.
